Toddville, IA 52341

citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a pest control program for burrowing mammals and insect pests. There was a large quantity of
live small, red beetles present in and under the feed trough for four elk. Also around the feed trough and shelter structure
are at least 5 holes in the ground that range from approximately 6-12 inches in diameter, likely made by a mammalian
pest. The facility representative stated they were unaware of these pests being present in the elk enclosure and do not
have a pest control program for insects or burrowing mammalian pests. Beetles and other insects may cause disease
hazards and discomfort to the animals. The mammalian pest burrows may cause injury to the animals if an elk were to
step into a hole or burrow.
A safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be
established and maintained.
To be corrected by: 22-September-2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
The facility does not have a pest control program for burrowing mammals and insect pests. There was a large quantity of 
live small, red beetles present in and under the feed trough for four elk. Also around the feed trough and shelter structure 
are at least 5 holes in the ground that range from approximately 6-12 inches in diameter, likely made by a mammalian 
pest. The facility representative stated they were unaware of these pests being present in the elk enclosure and do not 
have a pest control program for insects or burrowing mammalian pests. Beetles and other insects may cause disease 
hazards and discomfort to the animals. The mammalian pest burrows may cause injury to the animals if an elk were to 
step into a hole or burrow. 
A safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be 
established and maintained. 
To be corrected by: 22-September-2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
